Uubvine

Uubvine was a cult or civilisation centred around Godmage Vinewyltt, occupying the towering citadel Vinthak, close northward from Emero Wydth. The cult began to gather around Godmage Vinewyltt quite early on in the golden age, but became a fully-fledged city state far later - perhaps a few hundred years before the First North Sea Fiend Storm.
